mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_link_stats_today ( full_short_url, gid, date, today_uv, today_pv, today_uip, create_time, update_time, del_flag) VALUES( #{param.fullShortUrl}, #{param.gid}, #{param.date}, #{param.todayUv}, #{param.todayPv}, #{param.todayUip}, #{param.createTime}, #{param.updateTime}, #{param.delFlag} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE today_uv = today_uv + #{param.todayUv}, today_pv = today_pv + #{param.todayPv}, today_uip = today_uip + #{param.todayUip}, update_time = #{param.updateTime};
